long_description: Designed specifically for the needs of young anglers, the lightweight, durable Columbia Bahama Shirt for boys dries fast and protects skin with built-in UV protection for long hours in the sun. Water-repellent nylon taffeta with Omni-Shade(R) UPF 30 provides protection from damaging solar rays. Hidden, mesh-lined cape vents at the back shoulder keep cool air flowing through. The Columbia Bahama Shirt features a rod holder and roll-up sleeves.
short_description: Designed specifically for the needs of young anglers, the lightweight, durable Columbia Bahama Shirt for boys dries fast and protects skin with built-in UV protection for long hours in the sun.
